overview: A multi-disciplinary art director with more than 9 years of experience working with clients to achieve their marketing and design objectives using various media to achieve their goals. Equally comfortable in CMYK as RGB, I’ve spent my career working on everything from mobile apps to tradeshow signage, integrated marketing to catalogue design. For the past few years I’ve had the opportunity to stretch my legs in digital design: web, mobile, email and social. For my next endeavor I’d like to go deep and specialize further.
